entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM does not support nested structs with explicit layout #61385
  • [API Proposal]: Add a "You can ignore the return value safely" attribute #61382
  • .NET Standard 2.1 vs .NET 6 Threading in Blazor WASM #61381
  • Source build leg is timing out in official build #61378
  • Use of JsonSerializerContext Can Cause CS1591 #61379
  • Blazor WASM AOT .NET 6 performance degradation on Safari, iPhone 6, iOS 15.1 #61373
  • Unregistering grouped delegates does nothing. #61369
  • [wasm] Implement ValueTask marshaling #61368
    7.0.0
  • [.NET 6] UriBuilder breaking change not documented #61363
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestChainTests.CreateChain_RSAPSS failed on rolling builds #61362
  • Creating a PKCS7 signature from the result of RSACng.SignHash(..) with dotnet tools #61360
    Future
  • Regression in multiple benchmarks from value numbering #61375
  • System.Runtime.Extensions.Tests: Assertion failed #61359
  • [Proposal] SqlBulkCopy : Improve exception that is thrown when value conversion fails #61356
  • EventCounters unexpectedly stop reporting data when first of two listeners disconnects #61353
    7.0.0
  • wasm aot compilation failed for BlazorFluentUI.CoreComponents #61352
  • [API Proposal]: Posix error codes #61351
  • [Mono] Fix android rolling build failures #61343
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Test AOT builds failing due to OOM #61339
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\lcs\\_rellcsval\\_rellcsval.cmd #61338
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b487364/b487364/b487364.sh #61337

Closed

  • HTTP/3: Unit test variable length encoding #51519
    7.0.0
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #31320
    Future
  • Algorithm `xml-exc-c14n` not implemented? #61361
  • TimeSeparator has changed from : to . for da-DK in .NET 5+ #61380
  • Do not discard results of methods marked as pure #34098
    Future
  • [Proposal] IImmutableSet<T>.Union should handle duplicates like ISet<T>.UnionWith #14686
    Future
  • Improve ConcurrentBag<T> GetEnumerator performance #14835
    Future
  • Proposal: Dictionary with key and value in same object #18376
    Future
  • Add Move method to List<T> #19611
    Future
  • Micro-optimizing: Finding the middle of a given range #7520
    Future
  • Proposal: ImmutableDictionary.Create(TKey, TValue) #21559
    Future
  • API Proposal: Set-like operations over dictionaries #23244
    Future
  • Proposal: ReverseComparer #23263
    Future
  • ConcurrentDictionary: ApproximateCount #23278
    Future
  • Provide the way to control how HashSet<T> and Dictionary<T, V> grows #23519
    Future
  • Have HashSet<T> implement ICollection #23605
    Future
  • Add StructuralComparer<T> #23627
    Future
  • Improve performance of Immutable/SecureObjectPool/AllocFreeConcurrentStack #23686
    Future
  • List<T>: Improve InsertRange performance of lazy IEnumerable #9232
    Future
  • There should be an `ObservableDictionary<TKey, TVal>` in contrast to `ObservableCollection<T>`! #24510
    Future
  • Move, Reverse, etc. on LinkedList #25313
    Future
  • Idea for Dictionary<TKey, TValue> to make hash collisions be ordered by hashCode #9917
    Future
  • Proposal: ImmutableArray.UnsafeFreeze<T>(T[]) #25461
    Future
  • ConcurrentStack PushRange idea #25617
    Future
  • [Proposal] Use hash array mapped trie for ImmutableDictionary #26001
    Future
  • TryGetValue improvements #26685
    Future
  • LinkedList should provide find methods taking a predicate #27688
    Future
  • Add an ImmutableDictionary which has constant time lookups but is slow to update #27983
    Future
  • LINQ Merge Method for `IReadOnlyDictionary<TKey, TValue>` #28227
    Future
  • Proposal: Add an atomic ToArray + Clear method to ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue> #28434
    Future
  • "The parameter is incorrect." System.Collections.ListDictionaryInternal #28653
    Future
  • Proposal: add Join overload that returns a valueTuple #28747
    Future
  • Stable BinarySearch overload #28857
    Future
  • Covariant Immutable Collections #28911
    Future
  • API for inserting a Span<T> into a List<T> efficiently #1530
    Future
  • Queue<T>.Enqueue and Stack<T>.Push are slower than List<T>.Add #29084
    Future
  • Creating ImmutableDictionary from an existing dictionary is very slow #29089
    Future
  • Add ConditionalWeakTable.TryAdd API #29368
    Future
  • String Dictionary with StringComparer.Ordinal slower than default EqualityComparer #29714
    Future
  • Ctor of sorted collection classes should support IReadOnlyDictionary or IEnumerable #29829
    Future
  • Consider adding Count to ImmutableArrayExtensions #30074
    Future
  • Performance Issue with List<> & Prepend #13079
    Future
  • Potential regression: Dictionary of Value Types #13137
    Future
  • CollectionExtensions.TryAdd doesn't provide atomic check-and-add on a ConcurrentDictionary #30451
    Future
  • Design choices between two ...OutOfRangeException #30617
    Future
  • Consider creating an IndexSet Type #30817
    Future
  • Enumerating ImmutableSortedSet<> is slower than index-based for loop #1044
    Future
  • Proposal: support reference semantics for IComparable<T>, IEquatable<T> #1755
    Future
  • List<T> RemoveAt to return the removed value #31827
    Future
  • HashSet<T>.UnionWith() vs ctor(Enumerable<T>) performance. #32285
    Future
  • Evaluate if BitArray() can be further optimized using single AddPairwise operation #38719
    Future
  • [Proposal] Add MoveNext(ref T current) to IEnumerator<T> #43081
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute on Types to opt-out of default Serialization/Binding behavior when they implement Collection Interfaces #61354
  • MaxBy inconsistent results with tie-breaks #61317
    7.0.0
  • API diff for .NET 5 vs .NET 6 #61367
  • Array.Sort() can drop items if exception thrown mid-swap #61340
  • [Mono]: Random crash in interpreter when doing stackwalks as part of STW. #59054
    7.0.0
  • Azure Pipelines / runtime (Formatting windows x64) fails #61331
  • CertificateRequestChainTests tests may be subject to DST "fall back" spurious failures #61302
  • Sometimes enums are not blittable on Blazor WASM #61350
  • Regression in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder in DotNet 6 RC2 #61202
  • Installed .NET 6.0 and RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription property is returning incorrect version. #61330
  • System.Text.Json 4.7.2 uses System.Buffers >= 4.5.1(4.0.3.0 dll version) but asks for System.Buffers, Version=4.0.2.0 #38782
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Correct the endian swapping and string implementation #61386
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete unused mono_unbox_int #61384
    community-contribution
  • TEST: sample asmdiffs report #61383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow enums in unmanaged callbacks. #61377
  • Fix credscan bugs release/5.0 #61371
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • Rewrite selection for fields and always normalize SIMD types in VN #61370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix -rebuild command #61366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change WASM direct heap access to use helper functions #61355
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Move some Reflection call of Array ctor into managed #61347
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Completely lock-free ClassLoader::LookupTypeKey #61346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fix incorrect CCW decoding in GetObjectForCCW #61342
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 5.0.13
  • Support MULX returning ValueTuple #61336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • InstallWorkload: Use the repo's `nuget.config` as the base for installing manifests #60699
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix credscan bugs release/6.0 #61372
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Fix for InformationalVersion #61240
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix dump generation issues for VS4Mac #61063
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Delete unused test projects #61348
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove unnecessary DLLIMPORTGENERATOR_ENABLED ifdefs #61345
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Start tracking debug info for inlined statements #61220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Don't create a COM weak reference if the object is an aggregated COMWrappers RCW. #61283
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Proper VNs for zeroed structs #61285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Only run source-index on main branch. #61271
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect CCW decoding in GetObjectForCCW #61341
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Disable package validation in source-build for reliability #60881
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable a couple of pen tests on Windows on release/6.0 #60789
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-System.Drawing
  • [release/6.0] DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60577
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • SPMI: Use diffed bytes for jit-analyze and print more info #61254
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • Add additional steps in gcc validation leg #61241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #61376
  • Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61289
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ensure MaxBy/MinBy return first element if all keys are null. #61364
    area-System.Linq, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Remove WasmBuildTemplate #61315
    area-Build-mono
  • Use UTC throughout X509Certificate request tests #61344
    area-System.Security, test enhancement, community-contribution
  • Provide PEM implementations for AsymmetricAlgorithm. #61284
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm][aot] Disable (again) `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn3.11.Tests` failing due to OOM #61323
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix binplacing for (impl) System.Security.Cryptography.Encoding.dll #61333
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Adding Regex source generator to Microsoft.netcore.app.ref pack #61329
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: extend redundant relop to handle side effects #61275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix format.py to use jit-format.exe, not jit-format.bat #61334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/6.0.x] Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodInfoFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61298
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0.1] add support for macOS 12 #61028
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.1
  • Baseline two failing tests to make outerloop green again #61280
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Create superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1461871 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Explicitly mark tests with CLRTestKind=SharedLibrary #61235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Enable CSE/hoisting for "arrayBase + elementOffset" #61293
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST ONLY] Test stress build refactor #61311
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Pin Platform Manifest file to 6.0.0 Version of the file during servicing #61260
    area-Setup
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: slightly more aggressive tail duplication #61179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Build improvements #61276
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix: add missed open curly #61332
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • [wasm] Add task marshaling tests. #61324
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
